name: Curdles Revenge
description:
WINDOWS BUILD RECOMMENDED How to play

Movement: W, A, S, D

Look Around: Mouse

Attack: Left Mouse Button

Interact: E

Jump: Space

Objective: Destroy all towers and kill the Corrupted Afroduck Upgrades: Get upgrades from the Phoenix statue. How do i get to the boss fight? well you go through the portal once you destroy all towers: Curdles weapon of choice Different Enemies: (AFRODUCK, CURRUPTED MATTER)
